entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 29 by morning. POP 30%
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening with 30 percent chance of flurries this evening and overnight. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Temperature rising to minus 29 by morning. Wind chill minus 46 this evening and minus 41 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 26 December 2022
